author: CBC News
title: Health Canada says rapid blood test for COVID-19 remains under review
description: Health Canada says a rapid blood test for COVID-19 that’s being manufactured in Canada and shipped to the United States is not ready for use here.
content:
Health Canada says a rapid coronavirus blood test that's being manufactured in Canada and shipped to the United States is not ready for use here.
CBC News has learned that tests such as the one made by Markham, Ont., company BTNX are on hold in this country,… [+3805 chars]
